de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities

Class DependentLineObjectToObjectCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DependentGuiObjectCV
      • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DependentLineObjectToObjectCV

  • public class DependentLineObjectToObjectCV
extends DependentGuiObjectCV
    This class is used to specify lines that shall be drawn between two objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV. An object of class DependendLineGuiObjectCV will be registered with these two objects. After this registration, the endpoints of the line will always coincide with the centers of the objects, i.e. the line will always graphically connect the two objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor to initialize the attributes and to register the newly created object with the two AnimatedGuiObjectCV objects that are the endpoints of the new line.

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Method to draw a line between the current centers or borders of guiobj1 and guiobj2. This method will be called automatically by the draw() methods of all AnimatedGuiObjectsCV where this object is registered.
        Specified by:

      • onDeregisteredFromGuiObject

        public void onDeregisteredFromGuiObject(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj)
        Method called from the removeDependentGuiObject() of an AnimatedGuiObjectCV where this object was registered. Will deregister this object from the other AnimatedGuiObjectCV object as well.
        Specified by:
        onDeregisteredFromGuiObject in class DependentGuiObjectCV
        Parameters:
        guiobj - The object from where this method is called.

      • bothEndpointsVisible

        public boolean bothEndpointsVisible()
        Method to test if both endpoint objects are visible. Called by methods that shall draw the line. They will not draw the line if one of the endpoints is not visible.
        Returns:
        true if both endpoints are visible, false otherwise.
